title: TeGC looking for new roster!
body:
Hey all.

Truth Gaming Corps is looking for all roles for 2017 ranked flex queue main team.

Plat/Dia ranks.

Please leave details in comments. Do not add me off this page unless I request.

Summoner Name:
Season 6 rank:
Current flex rank:
Best Champions for Role:
Role:

replies.body:
Summoner Name: Wolfflare
Season 6 rank: D5
Current flex rank: P1 
Best Champions for Role: I can play any champ for the appropriate team composition
Role: Fill

Summoner Name: Doctor Jekyll
Season 6 rank: Plat 5 finish, P3 Peak.
Current flex rank: S4 (Got cucked by MMR bug on the first day pre-fix then got trolled on the extra match - rip) 
Best Champions for Role: Soraka, Nami, Tahm / Graves, Zac, Kindred, Reksai, elise
Role: Support / JG

Summoner Name: Felf
Season 6 rank: Plat 5 (Was Plat3 decayed, check op.gg)
Current flex rank: Gold 1
Best Champions for Role: Janna, Karma and Morganna. (Can play most supports)
Role: Support

Summoner Name: Trick2DG
Season 6 rank: Diamond 5 
Current flex rank: Gold 1 
Best Champions for Role: Leblanc, Aurelion Sol
Role: Mid

summoner name: kloufy
season 6 rank: platinum 5
current flex rank: still have to do 3 placements 
best champions for role: i'm a support main. i main thresh bard ali blitz braun (can play any supp)
role: support
Where's Nesting Dragons? That was a cool name.
How do you know about that? haha

Summoner Name: Deep Sanity
Season 6 rank: Silver 4
Current flex rank: Bronze 3
Best Champions for Role: Vayne, Lucian, Twitch / Hecarim, xin Zhao, Reksai
Role: Adc/Jg
